General.Name: Mitra Pinasthika Mustika Tbk
General.Description: PT Mitra Pinasthika Mustika Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the distribution of two-wheel vehicle and spare parts under Honda brand primarily in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Distribution, Retail, and Aftermarket; and Insurance. The company operates retail outlets under the MPMMotor name. It is also involved in the sale of used cars, vehicle rentals and drivers, auctions, general insurance, and financing activities, as well as online sale of four wheels-vehicle and its supporting activities. In addition, the company provides vehicles reparation and motorcycle maintenance services; computer consultant activities and other computer facility management services; and oil lubricants distribution services. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
